# VCF file structure
```{r}
library(vcfR)
```

```{r}
data(vcfR_example)
vcf
```
# The meta region
```{r}
strwrap(vcf@meta[1:7])
```
```{r}
queryMETA(vcf)
```

```{r}
queryMETA(vcf, element = 'DP')
```

```{r}
queryMETA(vcf, element = 'FORMAT=<ID=DP')
```

# The fix region
```{r}
head(getFIX(vcf))
```
# The gt region
```{r}
vcf@gt[1:6, 1:4]
```
# vcfR
```{r}
vcf <- read.vcfR("pinfsc50_filtered.vcf.gz")
```
```{r}
head(vcf)
```

```{r}
write.vcf(vcf, "myVCFdata_filtered.vcf.gz")
```
